mfcntl.h(7) Miscellaneous Information Manual mfcntl.h(7)

NAME

mfcntl.h — file control operations

LIBRARY

library “libmjo”

SYNOPSIS

#include <mfcntl.h>

#define O_BINARY

INCLUDES

<fcntl.h>

DESCRIPTION

Provides O_BINARY file creation flag on platforms that do not define it.

July 22, 2020 OpenBSD 7.0
